test_code_analysis: The tests verify the auth_controller login functionality, covering successful login, invalid credentials, missing fields in the request, and internal server errors.
The tests verify the login functionality of the account lock controller, covering scenarios such as successful login, invalid data, login failure, and service exceptions.

The tests verify the account lockout controller's login functionality, including successful login, handling of missing user ID and password, unsuccessful login attempts, and account lockout after too many failed attempts.
